project: 丽江古城绝美隐秘角落探访

results.description: 开场：舅舅站在高处俯视古城，手指指向远方
四方街旁的隐藏巷子，阳光透过木格窗洒在石板路上
狮子山下的小巷，雨后水面倒映出古建筑
隐藏在木门后的私家院落（获得主人许可）
大水车后方隐秘观景点
文昌宫附近观景台俯瞰古城全景
结尾：舅舅回到客栈拆除现场，看着照片微笑

prompts_used.description: 开场：舅舅站在高处俯视古城，手指指向远方
prompts_used.prompt: A middle-aged Chinese man standing on elevated viewpoint overlooking Lijiang ancient town, pointing towards distant hidden corners. Silhouette effect with golden sunset lighting, traditional Chinese rooftops and architecture spread below. The man wears casual traditional style clothing, shot from behind showing the panoramic view. beautiful hidden corners of Lijiang ancient town, traditional Naxi architecture, stone pathways, wooden windows, ancient courtyards. cinematic documentary style, warm natural lighting, realistic photography, high detail, 16:9 aspect ratio, dramatic backlighting, golden hour, epic documentary opening shot, depth of field with ancient town in soft focus

prompts_used.description: 四方街旁的隐藏巷子，阳光透过木格窗洒在石板路上
prompts_used.prompt: Hidden alley beside Sifang Square in Lijiang, morning sunlight streaming through traditional wooden lattice windows onto ancient stone pathway. Beautiful light patterns and shadows creating geometric shapes on weathered stone ground. beautiful hidden corners of Lijiang ancient town, traditional Naxi architecture, stone pathways, wooden windows, ancient courtyards. Traditional Chinese wooden window frames with intricate lattice work, empty peaceful alley with no tourists. cinematic documentary style, warm natural lighting, realistic photography, high detail, 16:9 aspect ratio, golden morning light, architectural photography, low angle shot emphasizing light patterns on stone

prompts_used.description: 狮子山下的小巷，雨后水面倒映出古建筑
prompts_used.prompt: Narrow stone alley at foot of Lion Hill (Shizishan) after rain, perfect reflections of traditional Chinese architecture in still water on stone ground. Ancient building reflections mirrored in puddles, creating symmetrical composition. beautiful hidden corners of Lijiang ancient town, traditional Naxi architecture, stone pathways, wooden windows, ancient courtyards. Wet stone pathways, traditional eaves and wooden structures reflected in water, twilight lighting with warm lanterns beginning to glow. cinematic documentary style, warm natural lighting, realistic photography, high detail, 16:9 aspect ratio, reflection photography, split composition half-real half-reflection, moody atmospheric lighting

prompts_used.description: 隐藏在木门后的私家院落（获得主人许可）
prompts_used.prompt: Traditional Chinese courtyard revealed through opening wooden door, creating dramatic visual transition from narrow alley to spacious private garden. Ancient Naxi-style architecture with wooden carvings, traditional courtyard with plants and stone elements. beautiful hidden corners of Lijiang ancient town, traditional Naxi architecture, stone pathways, wooden windows, ancient courtyards. Weathered wooden door with traditional Chinese hardware, glimpse of beautiful private courtyard beyond, afternoon lighting streaming into the space. cinematic documentary style, warm natural lighting, realistic photography, high detail, 16:9 aspect ratio, doorway framing composition, depth transition from dark to light, architectural documentary style

prompts_used.description: 大水车后方隐秘观景点
prompts_used.prompt: Secret viewing spot behind the famous Water Wheel, showing lesser-known perspective of Lijiang ancient town. Peaceful scenic overlook with traditional architecture views, no crowds, natural vegetation framing the scene. beautiful hidden corners of Lijiang ancient town, traditional Naxi architecture, stone pathways, wooden windows, ancient courtyards. Hidden pathway leading to secluded viewpoint, traditional Chinese buildings in middle distance, lush greenery and traditional landscape elements. cinematic documentary style, warm natural lighting, realistic photography, high detail, 16:9 aspect ratio, discovery moment photography, natural framing with vegetation, serene undisturbed location

prompts_used.description: 文昌宫附近观景台俯瞰古城全景
prompts_used.prompt: Elevated viewing platform near Wenchang Palace with panoramic view of entire Lijiang ancient town. Sweeping vista of traditional Chinese rooftops, ancient architecture, and mountains in background. beautiful hidden corners of Lijiang ancient town, traditional Naxi architecture, stone pathways, wooden windows, ancient courtyards. Golden sunset light illuminating the ancient town, traditional tile roofs creating patterns, distant mountains visible. cinematic documentary style, warm natural lighting, realistic photography, high detail, 16:9 aspect ratio, panoramic landscape photography, golden hour lighting, epic wide-angle vista, documentary establishing shot

prompts_used.description: 结尾：舅舅回到客栈拆除现场，看着照片微笑
prompts_used.prompt: Middle-aged Chinese man (uncle) at guesthouse renovation site, looking at photos on smartphone with satisfied smile. Construction/renovation scene with traditional architecture being restored, building materials and scaffolding visible. beautiful hidden corners of Lijiang ancient town, traditional Naxi architecture, stone pathways, wooden windows, ancient courtyards. The man holds phone showing scenic photos taken during exploration, warm expression of contentment and vision for future. cinematic documentary style, warm natural lighting, realistic photography, high detail, 16:9 aspect ratio, close-up portrait with renovation background, warm natural lighting, documentary conclusion shot, story-telling composition
